EmailTemplate.name: June 7th Webcast
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Livongo for Diabetes Mission and Results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good afternoon {!Contact.FirstName}. I hope this note finds you well.
Diabetes is likely one of the highest cost drivers in your health plan, and growing at an alarming rate. Please join Dr. Jennifer Schneider and myself as we provide a brief overview of the Livongo for Diabetes Program, our Outcomes and Guidance on how we can help you control these costs while empowering your employees, struggling with diabetes to live better.
To attend: email me and I'll forward the link!
Neal Lewis Regional Vice President Livongo m: 239.633.0482 e: nlewis@livongo.com a: 3960 Deep Passage Way, Naples, FL 34109 www.livongo.com
